markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Forestall Curse](/Feats.aspx?ID=6077) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You've learned to hold back your [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566). If the next action you use is a [cursebound](/Traits.aspx?ID=800) ability, your cursebound value doesn't increase.
name: Forestall Curse
